name: url-shortener
description: URL Shortener for reducing the long urls to tiny urls

scripts.all:install: concurrently -k -n "server:install,client:install" -c "cyan.bold,blue.bold" -r 1 npm run server:install npm run client:install
scripts.start: npm run server:install && npm run client:install && npm run build:client && npm run dev:server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
